query-japan-17-12-21.query: (lang:ja OR place_country:JP) -is:retweet -is:nullcast (#metoo OR #wetoojapan OR #stopfeminicides OR #私は黙らない)
query-japan-17-12-21.description: initial query, ran fully with success, considered only a limited number of hashtags over a year

query-japan-19-12-21.query: lang:ja -is:retweet -is:nullcast -#metoo -#wetoojapan -#stopfeminicides -#私は黙らない -#ビットコイン -#不正アクセス -#コインチェック (#ｍｅｔｏｏ OR #セクハラ OR #timesup OR #wetoo OR #集団ストーカー)
query-japan-19-12-21.description: second query ran fully with success, after the first one with hashtags extracted from the initial corpus to extend the volume of data, some of these hashtags turned out to be irrelevant and referring to conspiracy networks
